title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MUNICIPAL DEVELOPMENT COUNCIL (MDC) RESOLUTION NO. 2025-06, DATED AUGUST 15, 2025 ENTITLED ‚ÄùRESOLUTION REPROGRAMMING SOME PORTIONS OF THE 2098 MUNICIPAL DEVELOPMENT FUND CY 2025 CURRENT APPROPRIATIONS AMOUNTING TO ELEVEN MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS (PHP 11,500,000.00) FOR THE CONSTRUCTION / REHABILITATION / IMPROVEMENT OF THE BATONG MALAKE PUBLIC MARKET, PHASE 1, BRGY.
